name: Magic Blast VR
description: "Have you ever wanted to fight with magic?" "Magic Blast VR" is an action game to fight with magic in VR! In this game you can create original magic, and fights a lot of enemies. This game features "Magic Form" system. It can set your own form and shoot magic!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows10 Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970(AMD Radeon R9 290) Storage: 1.4 GB available space
